args:
Audric vanishes, which was always to be
his fate as one whose ties to the world had
been cut. With feelings for his father in his
heart, the prince makes his way to Grams with
his allies, where a new conflict has broken out.
It does indeed. Thank you, all of you—\nand apologies again for all the trouble\nI have caused.
With this, my part in this story\ncomes to an end.
Don't be daft. You've got your children to...\nAurelius? Aurelius, what's happening\nto your body?!
I fear my time is up.
I am something that should not exist in\nthis world and yet does—I am Aurelius,\nand I am dead.

I employed some rather forceful means to
remain here, but they have reached their
limit, and I am now being expunged from
this world.
But you will simply return to your original\nworld now, yes?
Alas, I have severed my bond to my\noriginal world. Dissolution is the fate\nwhich awaits me now.
There must be something we can do!
Do not trouble yourself. In truth,\nI should have died along with my world.
But I came here instead so I might make\nsomething that could be left to my\nchildren. That alone is enough.
I am sorry, my children, but the Progenitor,\nas well as whatever is lurking behind\nBahamut, still remain.
Though your fight must rage on, I will\nno longer be able to offer my aid.
Then rest easy, Father. For even without\nyou, we will not lose to the likes of them.
I swear that we shall see good tidings\nbid unto the heavens, Father.
I will see our duty done, even if it comes\nat the cost of my life!
Please don't say as much; I would not\nhave you taking after my fool ways.
Forgive my asking, Gatov, but pray watch\nover my children. They all bear a heavy\nburden, and will mostlike need your aid.
Of course, old friend. I'm rather used to\ntaking care of people who are good at\ngetting into trouble, after all.

{player_name} and Nedrick...
That I could see the pair of you join hands
in my last moments sends me off with a
heart lightened by happiness.

I'm afraid so. Reports claim a vile demon
called Satan has appeared there and
caused terrible damage, leaving the
Holy City in shambles.
My kittens report much the same.
Damnation! I hope everyone is all right...
If you wish to help, I can send you there\nwith faerie teleportation magic.
It's possible this is yet another of the\nProgenitor's schemes, which means we\ncannot afford to ignore it.
Whatever the deal is with that big jerk,\nwe've gotta go there and help folks!
Yet it is also imperative that we locate a\nmeans to deal with the Progenitor besides\ngiving the power of shapeshifting to all.
He is convalescing at my villa in the\nsuburbs and recovering apace.
Too bad he's not around, even though he'd\nprobably be all ＂I'M NOT HERE TO MAKE\nFRIENDS!＂ or whatever.
Well, you can't just expect us all to\nbecome bosom companions right away.\nStill, if he's recovering...

Then we should split up. The group
looking for different ways to deal with
the Progenitor shouldn't need that much
manpower, after all.

But I need the two people who made pacts
with Bahamut, so Nedrick, Zethia, and
Jinlorda should stick with me and help
with the search.
Everyone else can head to Grams.\nHow's that sound?
Whaaat?! We have to be separated\nfrom Zethia AGAIN?!
It is what it is. Right now, we've each got\nthings we have to do on our own.
I don't want everything Father left us\nto go to waste.
Do not worry. I believe a day will soon\ncome when we can all live together\nin happiness once more.
So let us now give everything that we\nhave for the sake of that day.
Okay, well, I'm super bummed about\nsplitting up again, but I'll fight like an\nangry wet cat if that's what it takes!
Come on, everyone. We're off to Grams!
